title: Get the top-N rows
sql:
-- How to use the FETCH FIRST clause to get
  -- top-N rows from a result set
  create table t ( c1 int );
  insert into t 
  values ( 1 ), ( 2 ), ( 2 ), ( 3 ), ( 4 );

  -- FETCH FIRST N ROWS ONLY gets up to N rows
  select * from t
  order  by c1
  fetch  first 2 rows only;

          C1
  ----------
           1
           2

  -- Get rows with the same value as the Nth
  -- e.g. both rows with c1 = 2 in the top 2
  -- FETCH FIRST N ROWS WITH TIES
  select * from t
  order  by c1
  fetch  first 2 rows with ties;

          C1
  ----------
           1
           2
           2

  -- Get a percentage of the rows with
  -- N PERCENT ROWS [ ONLY | WITH TIES ]
  select * from t
  order  by c1
  fetch  first 40 percent rows only;

          C1
  ----------
           1
           2
